page.title: 02The Bedlington Scout Group
page.content: This group meets each Thursday from 7:30 to 9:30 in a purpose-built building near the Community Centre at Guidepost.24 scouts is the maximum number,broken up into 4 patrols.Each patrol:Eagles,Falcons,Hawks & Kestrels has a leader and an assistant leader.The Scout Leader has an assistant and together with patrol leaders and assistants they plan in advance work and outings etc. allied to the scout movement. Outdoors activities are supported by a 15 seater bus with trailer,full camping equipment,canoes,life jackets etc. Under the new badge scheme boys can join between the ages of 10-15 years.When they join they work for their membership badge and then work for more badges.
